review: For as long as I had to wait to get this item, it sure has been worth it so far. Way better than the Chromecast that I chucked out the back door after a month. Setup was a snap, took maybe 5 mins. I hardly ever have issues with the need to buffer videos or movies and the HD quality is MIGHTY IMPRESSIVE!! The remote is small and easily fits in my hand; buttons are intuitive and easy to remember. THE ONLY thing that I would change is the search functionality. When searching for movies and such, if you click on a found title, then go back to search, I'd like for it to remember what I had typed in their previously so I don't have to retype everything again.
